press_button_launch.description: Press the button to launch the coffee machine.

clean_button_with_wipe.description: Clean the button using a wipe for improved hygiene.

press_coffee_button.description: Press the coffee machine button to start brewing.

clean_button_wipe.description: Wipe the coffee machine button for cleaning.

press_button.description: Press the button to activate the coffee machine.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to maintain its appearance and functionality.

remove_container.description: Slide out the coffee machine container for thorough cleaning or to refill.

insert_container.description: Slide the coffee machine container back in after refilling or cleaning.

clean_container_process.description: Thoroughly clean the container by removing it, wiping it, and then placing it back.

slide_out_container.description: Slide out the coffee machine container to clean or refill.

slide_in_container.description: Slide in the coffee machine container after cleaning or refilling.

clean_container_inside.description: Clean the inside of the container to remove any coffee residue.

pick_up_container.description: Pick up the coffee machine container.

place_container_back.description: Place the coffee machine container back in its place after cleaning or refilling.

clean_container.description: Clean the container to ensure no leftover coffee or residue.

pick_and_place_container.description: Pick up the container and place it back down.

remove_lid_wipe.description: Remove the lid and wipe it clean to avoid stains.

lift_and_replace_lid.description: Lift the lid and then place it back after cleaning or refilling.

remove_lid_cleaning.description: Remove the lid of the coffee machine for thorough cleaning.

replace_lid_after_cleaning.description: Replace the lid of the container after cleaning.

remove_lid.description: Remove the lid of the coffee machine container for cleaning or refilling.

replace_lid.description: Replace the lid of the coffee machine container after cleaning or refilling.

wipe_lid.description: Wipe the lid to keep it clean from coffee stains.

pick_and_place_lid.description: Pick and place the lid from its resting place.

wipe_body.description: Wipe the coffee machine body for spotless cleaning.

clean_body_wipe.description: Clean the outer body of the machine using a wipe.

clean_machine_body.description: Clean the body of the coffee machine to remove dust and maintain shiny surface.

clean_body_description.description: Clean the body of the coffee machine.

wipe_machine_body.description: Wipe the body of the coffee machine to keep it clean and hygienic.

clean_coffee_machine_parts.description: Perform a full cleaning of the coffee machine, including button, container, lid, and body.

full_machine_wipe.description: Full machine wipe including lid, container, button and body for a comprehensive cleaning.

clean_all_parts.description: Clean all the parts of the coffee machine including the button, container, lid, and body.

clean_complete_machine.description: Complete cleaning of the coffee machine including lid, container, button, and body.

clean_whole_coffee_machine.description: Clean the entire coffee machine including the container, lid, button, and the body of the machine.
